mapper.insert:
insert into project ( project_no, project_name, project_unit, project_type, project_status, project_join_time, project_teacher_name, project_teacher_dept, project_student_name, project_student_no, project_issubmit, project_year, project_supporting_materials, project_audit_status ) values ( #{project_no}, #{project_name}, #{project_unit}, #{project_type}, #{project_status}, #{project_join_time}, #{project_teacher_name}, #{project_teacher_dept}, #{project_student_name}, #{project_student_no}, #{project_issubmit}, #{project_year}, #{project_supporting_materials}, #{project_audit_status}
)
